snippet: A plane carrying five Americans and a Panamanian on an antidrug mission crashed in a jungle region in Colombia, killing four of the occupants and injuring the other two.
abstract: Three Americans and one Panamanian are killed when plane contracted by United States government for Central America Regional Security Initiative crashes in Colombia while on antidrug mission.
lead_paragraph: A plane carrying five Americans and a Panamanian on an antidrug mission crashed in a jungle region in Colombia, killing four of the occupants and injuring the other two.

headline.main: Crash in Colombia Kills 4, U.S. Says
headline.print_headline: Crash in Colombia Kills 4, U.S. Says

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
